subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: Cyklotron is a content management system - an application for easy development and management of websites.

Cyklotron project is sponsored by major player in the Non Governmental Organizations domain, and thus it's primary focus is serving the needs of NGOs, but the developed software will be also useful and available for commercial entities.
Cyklotron is based on earlier CykloKlon project. You can see Cyklotron in action on these major NGO websites in Poland: http://www.ngo.pl and http://www.niepelnosprawni.info.

It is developed as an Open Source project, and is based on a large number of open source libraries and tools. The software developed in the course of the project will be available for any non-commercial or commercial use on the terms of liberal BSD license.
The 2.0 release of Cyklotron software is a major milestone in it's development. Cyklotron has been recently ported to ObjectLedge and Coral libraries, signigifactly enhancing it's performance.

Cyklotron CMS is capable of running very large sites. The ngo.pl installation features 50+ virtual sites with 60000+ documents, and another 1000 is added each month. It also delivers impressive performance on a relatively modest hardware. Ngo.pl serves 2.5 million dynamically rendered pages a month, while running on $1500 dual Athlon machine, and the bottleneck for most of the time is the capacity of 2Mbit internet link.

Cyklotron is a mature product. It is in the making since September 2001, and ngo.pl site is running Cyklotron since March 2003. Tens of programmer-months were spent on weeding out the bugs and improving performance.
